name: 莎拉·麦克维
introduction: Sarah is best known for her role in the hit series Workin' Moms. At the age of 11 Sarah attended a theatre production of Don't Drink the Water at a federal prison where her father worked, and so began her passionate pursuit of acting and storytelling. A native of Ottawa, Sarah graduated from Canterbury High School for the Arts, pursued post secondary classical theatre training and began her career as an actor with five consecutive seasons at the prestigious Stratford Shakespeare Theatre Festival. Roles at Stratford included Cordelia in King Lear opposite Christopher Plummer, Marianna in All's Well that Ends Well and The Bawd in Pericles.
